message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000. It's a great compromise that still benefits both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget.

I understand your desire to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10500. It's a fair price that still reflects the value of the product, and I think it's a good compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. I'm willing to pay $9500, as I mentioned earlier. However, I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10000. That's the highest I'm willing to go.

I understand that you're willing to meet me in the middle at $10000, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for that price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11200. It's a fair price that still reflects the value of the product, and I think it's a good compromise.
